comments.html:
Dude... Why do you have to be this harsh ?
Everytime I read this blog, there are comments like yours that reminds me how humans are such a waste..
comments.name: Calm

comments.html: It's more about that I don't trust blindly everything from a self-appointed expert even if he's got huge experience in a field. Some experts admit no contradiction which says it all. In the end I think it doesn't matter for you if I agree or disagree on a point or does your ego? You should invest more in your EQ than in your IQ.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Man, its a shame that Scott Adams is such a right wing nut job. I really liked his cartoon.
comments.name: Anonymous
